alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 3:24AM MDT until May 04 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Emigration Creek in Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City. For Emigration Creek...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Emigration Creek in Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 130.0 cfs, minor flood damage will impact homes and structures along Emigration Creek, including areas of the Hogle Zoo. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3 AM Monday the flow was 117 cfs. - Emigration Creek crested earlier this evening near 144 cfs and flow is gradually decreasing. Another spike in flow to above flood stage is expected this evening into tonight. - Forecast...Emigration Creek will continue to see increases in flow each evening to near to above flood flow through at least Wednesday night. - Flood flow is 130.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 300 PM MDT.
